definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc
to take the big picture into consideration (idiom)/to work for the benefits of all

sentences.english: I. To unify your thoughts and always keep in mind the overall situation.
sentences.chinese: 统一思想，牢固树立大局意识。

sentences.english: Will the issue affect the overall China-US relations?
sentences.chinese: 这一问题是否将影响到中美关系大局？

sentences.english: To our disappointment, he fails to take the whole situation into consideration.
sentences.chinese: 使我们失望的是他不顾全大局。

sentences.english: Social management improved step by step. Social stability was ensured and the.people lived and worked in peace and contentment.
sentences.chinese: 社会管理逐步完善，社会大局稳定，人民安居乐业。

sentences.english: We should keep the tail from wagging the dog to deal with all the things.
sentences.chinese: 我们在处理任何事情的时候都要记得顾全大局。

sentences.english: First, keep focused on the overall interests while adhering to principles.
sentences.chinese: 第一，要着眼大局，坚持原则。

sentences.english: But Americans still want their commander-in-chief to take command.
sentences.chinese: 但是美国仍然希望他们的首长能担当大局。

sentences.english: To our disappointment he refused to take the whole situation into account.
sentences.chinese: 使我们失望的是他不顾全大局。

sentences.english: But it's really hard to keep the big picture in focus if you're hating the moment-to-moment!
sentences.chinese: 但如果你讨厌即时反馈，就很难专注于保持整体大局。

sentences.english: Having perspective of overall situation and the spirit of dedication.
sentences.chinese: 具有大局观与奉献精神。

sentences.english: But he and others stressed that these concessions did not affect the overall targets.
sentences.chinese: 但是他和其他的议员强调这些让步并不影响整个大局。

sentences.english: Sacrifice yourself, on-time, loyal to argue, is from.
sentences.chinese: 牺牲小我，顾全大局，争论无益，忠恕是从。

sentences.english: You talk about, you know, being able to prioritize and manage.
sentences.chinese: 你要谈到的是，你知道，你能够合理统筹，顾全大局。

sentences.english: People that are in love tend to look beyond minor annoyances to the bigger picture.
sentences.chinese: 沐浴在爱中的人会顾全大局而不会计较一些小缺陷。

sentences.english: Too many companies are missing the big picture.
sentences.chinese: 太多的企业缺少大局观。

sentences.english: They don’t really see the big picture like adults do.
sentences.chinese: 他们并不能像成年人那样真正的明白大局。

definition: to take the big picture into consideration (idiom)/to work for the benefits of all
to judge the hour and size up the situation/to take stock
large scale program of lasting importance/project of paramount importance/to think big/annual national audit
major policy of the national government
to concern/on (some topic)/about/concerning/to have importance for
not to get involved/to stay out of it
